waterToys.name: Seabob
waterToys.description: Ride on the surface or emerge under water with these luxury under water jet skis (SEABOBs). Easy to ride for young and old. Recommended age is 12+. Comes fully charged for usage, batteries last for approximately 1-2 hours depending on riders style. Charger also included.
waterToys.details: 48 hours notice required. Vendor collects remaining balance of $400 per Seabob prior to rental date. Rental duration is for the length of your entire charter.

waterToys.name: Flitescooter
waterToys.description: Enhance your yacht charter experience with a Flitescooter board! Instructor available upon request for an additional charge. Comes fully charged for usage, batteries last for approximately 1-2 hours depending on riders style. Charger also included. Max load 225lbs.
waterToys.details: 48 hours notice required. Vendor collects remaining balance of $400 per board prior to rental date. Rental duration is for the length of your entire charter.

waterToys.name: Water Sports | Water Skiing | Tubing | Wake Boarding
waterToys.description: A dedicated watersports boat may be arranged to meet the yacht during your charter for additional on water activities. The watersports boat is operated independently and accommodates up to six guests, with activities that may include wakeboarding, water skiing, and tubing.
waterToys.details: Water sports boat is $300 per hour with a 2 hour minimum. Provided by an independent vendor.

waterToys.name: Floating Cabana
waterToys.description: A floating Cabana, the perfect add-on for unforgettable relaxation and luxury. This spacious and stable floating oasis offers plush seating and ample space for sunbathing, sipping refreshing drinks, or enjoying a gourmet picnic with friends and family.
waterToys.details: 48 hours notice required. Rental starts at $349 per cabana for delivery and setup. Rental duration is for the length of your entire charter.

waterToys.name: Floating Lounge Chair
waterToys.description: Add on a Floating Lounge Chair, the perfect addition for ultimate relaxation. The floating lounge chairs are designed for comfort and style, providing an ideal spot for sunbathing, enjoying a refreshing drink, or sharing a conversation with friends and family.
waterToys.details: 48 hours notice required. Each chair is $99 and there is a two chair minimum to rent for delivery and setup.

flowers.name: Rose Pave
flowers.description: Enhance your yacht's ambiance with our exquisite floral arrangement featuring luxurious roses. This special package showcases a selection of premium roses artfully arranged in a vase, adding a touch of timeless beauty to your onboard experience.

flowers.name: Blooming Orchid
flowers.description: Exclusive floral arrangement featuring exotic orchids. This bespoke package includes a stunning display of fresh orchids meticulously arranged in an elegant vase, perfectly curated to complement the luxury of your yacht setting.

flowers.name: Tropical Paradise
flowers.description: Bring the tropics onboard with this vibrant tropical flower arrangement.

flowers.name: Dancing Roses
flowers.description: Elegant arrangement of dancing roses that brings movement and grace to your yacht.

bachelorette.name: "Last Toast On The Coast"
bachelorette.description: The Vibe Package - Designed for groups who want their bachelorette to feel festive and coordinated. From drinks onboard to water time photos, this package brings together the essential touches that turn a yacht charter into a true celebration.
includes: Last Toast On The Coast banner
Bridal sash with crown and veil

bachelorette.name: "Last Sail Before The Veil"
bachelorette.description: Mid-tier bachelorette package with additional party essentials.

bachelorette.name: "Something Blue Before I Do"
bachelorette.description: Premium bachelorette package for an unforgettable celebration.

bachelorette.name: Drone Keepsake Video Experience
bachelorette.description: Professional drone video of your bachelorette yacht experience. Perfect add-on to any package.

catering.name: Gourmet Wraps Platter
catering.description: Made fresh to order, includes lettuce and tomato. Customize your platter options.
